txt.en:
'The Eating Contest will begin when I announce its start, and repeats every few minutes if you happen to miss it.

The first station is here, and you have as much time as you want to complete the challenge at this table. You may eat as quickly or as slowly as you like.

After this first bit, however, I'm afraid the pace must pick up a bit. You'll have a limited amount of time to run to each subsequent eating station and eat your fill... and it will only get harder as you go!

There are five eating stations in all, and only the most skilled eaters make it to the very end.'
How does the Eating Contest work?
